title: Mayor Lungo-Koehn Appoints New Finance Director – The City of Medford, MA - Medford, MA

description: Robert Dickinson will assume duties this spring following an exhaustive six-month search and hiring process. Mayor Breanna Lungo-Koehn has appointed Nantucket Assistant Town Accountant Robert Dicki…
